projectDesc.p: This corpus is developed from HISe's scholarly edition of the Henrik Ibsen's Writings, which comprises all of Ibsen's published (and many unpublished) works. The project was started in 1999 and completed in 2010. It is maintained by the Centre for Ibsen Studies at the University of Oslo.

The works included in this DraCor corpus are all of Ibsen's published dramas, as well as his unpublished drama manuscripts. Also included are various versions of a selection of plays. The reason for this inclusion is that the versions often carry significant differences. Some may have been updated with a modernised language, and others in other formats. However, the versions typically carry with them semantic differences, which may be of interest for some areas of research.
